
File `term1-00001.gz` contains a json file which is a representation of a 3270 screen.

For example:
```
  "id": "term1",
  "runId": "L1",
  "sequence": 1,
  "images": [
    {
      "sequence": 1,
      "id": "term1-1",
      "inbound": true,
      "imageSize": {
...etc...
```

File `term-00001.png` is the equivalent rendered image.
